mapper.insert: insert into hz_hyper_template (id, `name`, system_id, system_name, hyper_type, format, cluster_id, disk_size, creator_id, create_time, `state`, guacd_info, url, vm_id, file_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diskSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guacdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hz_hyper_template set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_name = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hyper_type = #{hyperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, format = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disk_size = #{diskSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, guacd_info = #{guacdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vm_id = #{vmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
